name: BitcoinJesus
0:
”Alexa ask Bitcoin Jesus what he thinks.”
”Alexa ask Bitcoin Jesus what he says.”
”Alexa ask Bitcoin Jesus for a quote.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitcoin jesus
des: Though we walk through the valley of the shadow of fiat and the Fed, we will fear no inflation: for thou art with us; thy blockchain and thy proof of work, they comfort us.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
